name: Refined Iron Axe
description: A stronger, more durable axe. Harvests 20% more wood per task.

name: Twin Axes
description: One axe in each hand means double productivity. It makes sense. Reduces wood harvesting time by 50%.

name: Worn Pickaxe
description: A basic pickaxe. Not much, but it gets the job done. Allows harvesting of basic metals and minerals.

name: Lumberjack's Guild
description: Form a guild to help your workers hone their skills. Workers harvest 15% more wood.

name: Bronze Pickaxe
description: A stronger and more durable pickaxe, capable of mining more valuable metals.

name: Sharpened Pickaxe
description: A highly sharpened pickaxe. Mines at a much higher rate.

name: Bronze Axe
description: With this, you can bring down stronger and taller trees.

name: Iron Axe
description: With this, you can bring down stronger and taller trees.

name: Steel Axe
description: With this, you can bring down stronger and taller trees.

name: Latinum Axe
description: An axe strong enough to free the spirits of ents from the bodies that entomb them.

name: Temprous Staff
description: Imbued with the power of ages past, this staff can reunite ent spirits with their former bodies, granting them new life.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: A stronger and more durable pickaxe, capable of mining more valuable metals.

name: Steel Pickaxe
description: A stronger and more durable pickaxe, capable of mining more valuable metals.

name: Latinum Pickaxe
description: A stronger and more durable pickaxe, capable of mining more valuable metals.

name: Refined Steel Axe
description: A stronger, more durable axe. Harvests 45% more wood per task.

name: Refined Latinum Axe
description: A stronger, more durable axe. Harvests 150% more wood per task.

name: Emblem of the Ents
description: Imbues revived ents with far greater power. Grants an extra 75% per revived ent.

name: Refined Iron Pickaxe
description: A stronger, more durable pickaxe. Harvests 20% more material per task.

name: Refined Steel Pickaxe
description: A stronger, more durable pickaxe. Harvests 75% more material per task.

name: Refined Latinum Pickaxe
description: A stronger, more durable pickaxe. Harvests 200% more material per task.

name: Expanded Burner
description: A larger burner for your forge, capable of smelting ores faster.

name: Enhanced Burner
description: A larger burner for your forge, capable of smelting ores faster.

name: Refined Burner
description: A larger burner for your forge, capable of smelting ores faster.

name: Lavish Burner
description: A larger burner for your forge, capable of smelting ores faster.

name: Excessive Burner
description: Alright, you can't possibly need this much space.

name: Temprous Purifier
description: Increases the purity of temprous ingots processed by the temprous distillery.

name: Triplet Axes
description: I'm not even going try and figure out how this works, okay?

name: Lumber Mill
description: Processes logs at a rate far beyond what's possible manually.

name: Enchanted Latinum Axe
description: Enchanted by the spirits of fallen ents allows this axe's wielder to operate at an unnatural speed.

name: Temprous Siphon
description: Using this siphon, ents can regain their full strength much more quickly.

name: Decorated Pickaxe
description: Technically these pickaxes aren't any better, but they look pretty. And that's pretty nice.

name: Explosive Mining
description: Pickaxes laced with a tiny, tiny amount of black powder. The science seems to add up.

name: Temprous Catalyst
description: Speeds up the temprous purification process.

name: Limestone Burner
description: This reinforced burner can withstand much higher temperatures, allowing you to produce ingots much faster.

name: Marble Burner
description: This reinforced burner can withstand much higher temperatures, allowing you to produce ingots much faster.

name: Obsidian Burner
description: This reinforced burner can withstand much higher temperatures, allowing you to produce ingots much faster.

name: Diamond Burner
description: This reinforced burner can withstand much higher temperatures, allowing you to produce ingots much faster.

name: Temprous Burner
description: This reinforced burner can withstand much higher temperatures, allowing you to produce ingots much faster.

name: Kelley the Deforester
description: Dammit, Jim! I'm a lumberjack, not a doctor! (Allows you to assign workers for more tree varieties.)

name: Elder Ent
description: This respected ent elder will offer his services to help guide more of his kin back into this world.

name: Mineral Enthusiast
description: Once an officer of the law, this man has put his career aside to pursue his true passion: mining minerals.

name: Mineral Obsessive
description: This guy REALLY likes minerals!

name: Dwarven Miner
description: Dwarves aren't actually very active miners. This guy just loves his job.

name: Dwarven Champion
description: Dwarves are naturally inclined to be the best at whatever they do, even things that are totally un-dwarfish like mining.

name: Musical Lumberjacks
description: This funny little tune helps the lumberjacks stay focused, but you'll NEVER get it out of your head. Increases worker yield by 60%.

name: Entking
description: With their king at last restored to his former glory, the ents find themselves greatly invigorated.

name: Miner's Guild
description: Form a guild to help your workers hone their skills. Miners harvest 15% more material.

name: Miner Musical
description: Those who underperform are "encouraged" to sing along.

name: Temprous Master
description: There is no other with the prowess this master posesses in handling temprous metal. Workers generate 50% more temprous.

name: Bronze Hoe
description: Allows you to harvest more crop varieties.

name: Iron Hoe
description: Allows you to harvest more crop varieties.

name: Fishing Rod
description: With this, you can catch some small fish.

name: Gold-tipped Rod
description: The bright metallic tip can attract some highly dangerous, and highly lucrative, fish.

name: Expanded Plots
description: Gains 200% more crops per harvest.

name: Scarecrow
description: Gains 300% more crops per harvest.

name: Fishing Net
description: Gains 200% more fish per harvest.

name: Sign That Says "Please Swim Into This Net"
description: Gains 300% more fish per harvest.

name: Expanded Farm
description: Gains 200% more creatures per harvest.

name: Massive Farm
description: Gains 300% more creatures per harvest.

name: Sharpened Tools
description: Reduces farming time by 50%.

name: Automated Harvesting
description: Reduces farming time by 50%.

name: Decent Rod
description: Reduces fishing time by 50%.

name: Not-too-shabby Rod
description: Reduces fishing time by 50%.

name: Marble Walls
description: Reduces creature hunting time by 50%.

name: Obsidian Walls
description: Reduces creature hunting time by 50%.

name: Stone Oven Frame
description: Reduces oven harvest time by 10%.

name: Iron Oven Frame
description: Reduces oven harvest time by 15%.

name: Steel Oven Frame
description: Reduces oven harvest time by 15%.

name: Obsidian Oven Frame
description: Reduces oven harvest time by 20%.

name: Diamond Oven Frame
description: Reduces oven harvest time by 25%.

name: Temprous Oven Frame
description: Reduces oven harvest time by 50%.

name: Fisherman
description: Allows workers to be assigned to hunting fish.

name: Monster Pocketer
description: Allows workers to be assigned to hunting creatures.

name: Personal Chef
description: Allows workers to be assigned to some cooking tasks.

name: Noseless Chef
description: Allows workers to be assigned to cooking fish.

name: Five-star Restaurant
description: Allows workers to be assigned to cooking creatures.

name: Farmer Dating App
description: Workers gain 200% more crops per harvest.

name: Hunting Season
description: Workers gain 200% more fish/animals per harvest.

name: Food Critic
description: Workers cook 200% more food per harvest.

name: Temporal Cooking
description: Workers cook 500% more food per harvest.

name: Reinforced Oven
description: Cooks 20% more food per harvest.

name: Cleaned Oven
description: Cooks 45% more food per harvest.

name: Fortified Oven
description: Cooks 60% more food per harvest.

name: Artisan Oven
description: Cooks 80% more food per harvest.

name: Semi-Perfect Oven
description: Cooks 100% more food per harvest.

name: Perfect Oven
description: Cooks 250% more food per harvest.
